channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- Nomad server on Domino
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- Nomad server on Domino

item.title: CVE-2024-30128|2024-09-25T14:42:53.930Z -- hcl%20software -- nomad%20server%20on%20domino
item.description: HCL Nomad server on Domino is affected by an open proxy vulnerability in which an unauthenticated attacker can mask their original source IP address. This may enable an attacker to trick the user into exposing sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-30130|2024-07-19T17:19:14.601Z -- hcl%20software -- nomad%20server%20on%20domino
item.description: HCL Nomad server on Domino is vulnerable to the cache containing sensitive information which could potentially give an attacker the ability to acquire the sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-23588|2024-07-05T13:08:46.782Z -- hcl%20software -- nomad%20server%20on%20domino
item.description: HCL Nomad server on Domino fails to properly handle users configured with limited Domino access resulting in a possible denial of service vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-23588|2024-07-08T19:58:31.610Z -- hcl%20software -- nomad%20server%20on%20domino
item.description: HCL Nomad server on Domino fails to properly handle users configured with limited Domino access resulting in a possible denial of service vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-30130|2024-08-02T01:25:03.056Z -- hcl%20software -- nomad%20server%20on%20domino
item.description: HCL Nomad server on Domino is vulnerable to the cache containing sensitive information which could potentially give an attacker the ability to acquire the sensitive information.
